system.description: This spell targets everyone within a Medium Burst Template; those who fail to evade with an opposed Agility roll suffer 2d6 damage (one die is considered cold damage, the other bludgeoning, on a raise the bonus damage die should also be considered bludgeoning damage). The storm remains until the beginning of the caster's next turn; the area is treated as Difficult Ground, and everyone within (or entering) the area suffers a -2 penalty to listening- based Notice rolls.
system.rank: Seasoned (Mage and Shaman) or Veteran (Water Sphere)
